genresAdvancedInfo.name: modern electroacoustic
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Modern electroacoustic is a genre of contemporary music that blends electronic and acoustic elements. It often features experimental soundscapes, unconventional instrumentation, and a focus on sound design. The genre is characterized by its use of technology to create new and unique sounds, often blurring the line between acoustic and electronic music. Some notable modern electroacoustic artists include Alva Noto, Ryoji Ikeda, and FKA Twigs.
